metadata.title: Universal Media Downloader for Bilibili, Douyin, Xiaohongshu
metadata.description: Free online downloader for Bilibili, Douyin, and Xiaohongshu. Paste a link to auto-detect platform, download videos, and extract audio to MP3 in your browser.

metadata.ogTitle: Universal Media Downloader - Free Online Tool

faqPage.metaTitle: Video Download FAQ | Bilibili, Douyin, Xiaohongshu Supported
faqPage.metaDescription: FAQ for video downloads on Bilibili, Douyin, and Xiaohongshu, including no-watermark downloads, link formats, audio extraction, quality options, and parsing issues.
faqPage.metaOgTitle: Video Download FAQ | Bilibili, Douyin, Xiaohongshu Supported
faqPage.metaOgDescription: FAQ for video downloads on Bilibili, Douyin, and Xiaohongshu, including no-watermark downloads, link formats, audio extraction, quality options, and parsing issues.
faqPage.title: Video Download FAQ (Bilibili / Douyin / Xiaohongshu)
faqPage.intro: This tool supports video downloads and audio extraction for Bilibili, Douyin, and Xiaohongshu. Paste a link to auto-detect the platform and show download options.

questions.question: How to download Bilibili videos?
questions.answer: Paste the Bilibili video link, click parse, then choose video download.

questions.question: How to download Douyin videos without watermark?
questions.answer: Paste the Douyin share link and the tool will provide a no-watermark download.

questions.question: What Xiaohongshu links are supported?
questions.answer: Share links and short links are supported; paste to parse automatically.

questions.question: Can I extract MP3 from Bilibili videos?
questions.answer: Yes. After parsing, you can choose audio download or MP3 extraction.

questions.question: What video quality can I download?
questions.answer: Available quality depends on the source video and platform limits.

questions.question: Why does parsing sometimes fail?
questions.answer: The link may be invalid, restricted, or blocked by platform controls.

questions.question: Can I download paid or restricted content?
questions.answer: No. Copyright-restricted or paid content is not supported.

questions.question: Do I need to register or log in?
questions.answer: No. Just paste the link to use the tool.

questions.question: Does it work on mobile?
questions.answer: Yes. Open the site in a mobile browser and paste the link.

questions.question: Which browsers are supported?
questions.answer: We recommend the latest Chrome, Edge, or Safari.

questions.question: Do you store my download history?
questions.answer: No. History is stored only in your browser locally.

questions.question: What if parsing is slow?
questions.answer: Check your network or try again later; some platforms throttle speed.

douyin.apiLimitDownload: If automatic download fails, please click open link to download manually (download feature is in the bottom right corner of the video)

en: Extract MP3 audio from Bilibili videos

en.question: How to download Bilibili audio?
en.answer: Paste the Bilibili video link into the input field, click download, and the MP3 audio will be extracted and downloaded automatically.

en.question: How to download Douyin videos without watermark?
en.answer: Paste the Douyin video link, the tool will automatically detect the platform and provide a watermark-free download link.

en.question: How to download Xiaohongshu images and videos?
en.answer: Copy the Xiaohongshu note link, paste it into the input box, and the tool will automatically parse and provide watermark-free images or video downloads.

en.question: Is this tool free to use?
en.answer: Yes, this is a completely free online tool with no registration required. You can download unlimited videos and audio files.

title.en: How to download Bilibili, Douyin and Xiaohongshu content
